remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来同步两个线程的活动。The following example uses an to synchronize the activities of two threads. 第一个线程（即应用程序线程） `Main`执行。The first thread, which is the application thread, executes `Main`. 它将值写入受保护的资源，该资源是名为 `number``static` （Visual Basic 中`Shared`）字段。It writes values to the protected resource, which is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) field named `number`. 第二个线程执行静态 `ThreadProc` 方法，该方法读取 `Main`写入的值。The second thread executes the static `ThreadProc` method, which reads the values written by `Main`. `ThreadProc` 方法等待 。The `ThreadProc` method waits for the . 当 `Main` 对 调用 方法时，`ThreadProc` 方法会读取一个值。When `Main` calls the method on the , the `ThreadProc` method reads one value. 立即重置，因此 `ThreadProc` 方法会再次等待。The immediately resets, so the `ThreadProc` method waits again. 程序逻辑可保证 `ThreadProc` 方法不会两次读取相同的值。The program logic guarantees that the `ThreadProc` method will never read the same value two times. 它不保证 `ThreadProc` 方法将读取 `Main`写入的每个值。It does not guarantee that the `ThreadProc` method will read every value written by `Main`. 这一保证需要另一个 锁。That guarantee would require a second lock. 执行每个写入操作后，`Main` 通过调用 方法得出，为第二个线程分配一个机会。After each write operation, `Main` yields by calling the method, to give the second thread a chance to execute. 否则，在单处理器计算机上 `Main` 将在两个读取操作之间写入多个值。Otherwise, on a single-processor computer `Main` would write many values between any two read operations. remarks.format: ## Remarks Set 方法释放单个线程。The Set method releases a single thread. 如果没有等待线程，则等待句柄会保持终止状态，直到某个线程尝试等待它，或者直到其重置方法被调用为止。If there are no waiting threads, the wait handle remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it, or until its Reset method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不保证每次调用 Set 方法都将释放一个线程。There is no guarantee that every call to the Set method will release a thread. 如果两次调用都过于接近，因此在释放线程之前发生第二次调用，则只释放一个线程，就像第二次调用未发生一样。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released - as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果在没有等待的线程并且 已发出信号的情况下调用 Set 方法，则调用不起作用。Also, if the Set method is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect.
